item.title: CRBG
item.description: score:64 Chances: Corebridge Financial’s expansion of its annuity lineup, higher sales of insurance policies, and an aging U.S. population provide potential growth opportunities. The company’s focus on providing retirement solutions and insurance products aligns with the growing desire of Americans to live longer and ensure financial security in their later years.
